response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a range of features that are sure to enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its unique benefits, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $180. Should you decide to accept this offer, you'll be making an investment in a product that promises long-term value and satisfaction. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 180}
